Package slatepowered.reco

Class BinaryCommunicationProvider<C extends ProvidedChannel>

java.lang.Object
slatepowered.reco.AbstractChannel
slatepowered.reco.CommunicationProvider<C>
slatepowered.reco.BinaryCommunicationProvider<C>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Channel, ProvidedChannel
public abstract class BinaryCommunicationProvider<C extends ProvidedChannel> extends CommunicationProvider<C>
A communication provider which is built on byte streams (binary data), so which needs a Serializer instance.
